quotes.quote: Salary negotiations shouldn't be limited to just salary. Salary pays your mortgage, but terms build your career.
Salary stories are intrusive. Do you ask your neighbour what they earn for their job?
The salary of the chief executive of a large corporation is not a market award for achievement. It is frequently in the nature of a warm personal gesture by the individual to himself.
It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.
Try to save something while your salary is small; it's impossible to save after you begin to earn more.
A salary does not make a person rich, but only gives him the opportunity to take care of hisneeds. It is not a means of becoming wealthy. It is a means of fulfilling our potential.
The only way to make real wealth is to get rid of your salary. In a salary, by definition, you are creating wealth for others, and you are creating a chain and handcuffs for yourself.
The reason that man is seldom satisfied with his salary is that when it increases, he increases his expenses.
To work for salary is to mortgage your life.
Salary is the price you pay to compromise on your dreams.
A salary is a tax employers pay, every four weeks, for putting an employee’s dream on hold.
Paying good wages is not charity at all-it is the best kind of business.
Wages are determined by the bitter struggle between capitalist and worker.
The best of wages will not compensate for excessively long working hours which undermine heath.
Wages cannot be considered as a gift, because they are due to work, but God has given free grace to all men by the justification of faith.
A day’s pay for a day’s work is more than adequate when both the work and the pay are appreciated as much as they are expected.
Money and salary is not a particularly good motivator in the long term.
It is my belief that one's salary is between an individual and the IRS.
Salary matters shouldn't be told to everyone. It's a matter of respect for my teammates.
Anybody who makes an outlandish salary obviously attracts attention.
The three most harmful addictions are heroin, carbohydrates, and a monthly salary.
Obscene salaries send the wrong message through a company.
Salaries and wages must reflect the reality of the enterprise's economic performance; deviations from the planned performance should be reflected in pay.
Salary is no object: I want only enough to keep body and soul apart.
The fact that somebody is reducing your salary is just telling me they're not satisfied with what you're doing.
The first commitment is raise your salary. One of the ways to raise your salary sometimes is to have short-term profits but there are many other ways.
Job and salary is the greatest slavery you can ever set upon yourself.
It stands to reason: Higher wages means higher loyalty and morale, which means higher productivity, which means a more profitable business.
You pay more in wages, get more in in tax, you get people living a higher standard, you get more money. It's a kind of circle.
Paying good wages is not in opposition to good productivity.
